content: a quick and easy crescent shawl with a simple lace edging and garter stitch body wrap it over your winter coat or scrunch it up into a cowl - either way you ll be cosy and warm on the coldest days the edging is knit sideways after the shawl is worked v2 includes instructions to eliminate the hump that some people have had at cast on otherwise the pattern is the same as the original the shawl is very easy to make larger keep knitting the body as per the pattern but make sure your final stitch count is divisible by 8 eight then the border should work as written with no stitches left over needles 4mm yarn 335m 363 yards vinnis serina 100% bamboo 4 ply/sport gauge 26sts to 30 row = 10cm size span = 150cm / depth = 30cm if you need a video tutorial on working an applied border please try this one https //www youtube com/watch v=eb27r_g-cgy&t=230s thank you so much to silcon for translating the pattern into portuguese 12th september 2017 in the translation to portuguese there is a mistake on the row 9 till 16 the last yarn over is a mistake há uma erro nas voltas 9 até à 16 a última laçada é erro não leva laçada
